data.name: Hybrid Harmony
data.detailed_description:
(Follow the link to our website on this Steam page to be directed to our Kickstarter, which runs from July 13th 2022, to August 14th 2022.)

Welcome to Redwood!
Hybrid Harmony is a romantic comedy visual that takes place in a modern-fantasy world filled with mythical creatures, magic, and Hybrids! Hybrids are people that are a mixture between Human and mythical race, i.e., mermaids, werewolves, leprechauns, lamia, etc. In the game, you play as Matt Cooper, a Human entered into an All-Hybrid school through a special social program - the ’Hybrid Harmony’ program. During your time at this new school, you’ll meet some truly magical characters, go on life-changing adventures, and fall in love!



Key Features
  • 500k+ words spanning over 20 to 30 hours of gameplay.
  • Over 70 CGs, dozens of sprites, and over one hundred backgrounds.
  • Partial voice acting for every character that appears in the game, with CGs being fully voiced!
  • Tons of meaningful choices that can not only change the story, but also alter dialogue, background art, and character sprites.
  • The game features an in-depth phone system - you can text characters, make choices, change and unlock wallpapers, and even read up on the town and school in their forums!
  • The game also features an expansive glossary that will deepen the world with lore, and feature information on Hybrids, locations, people and animals.



The Main Girls!
  • Evelyn: the loudmouthed, fun-loving vampire! Evelyn loves to party, pull pranks, and have a good time, even if it constantly gets her into trouble.
  • Brooke: the quick-to-anger, larger-than-life troll! She is the epitome of the phrase "school psycho" - many people wonder whether there exists a secret sweet side to this terrifying troll...
  • Poppy: the kindhearted, always-innocent fairy! There are a lot of expectations put upon Poppy - what with her celebrity status and adoring fans - it's a good thing she can handle that kind of pressure...
  • Mizushi: the cutesy, curious kappa! What she lacks in social skills, she makes up for in friendliness, confidence, and a boundless curiosity! Especially when it comes to Humans...

data.short_description: A romantic comedy visual novel set in a modern fantasy world filled with mythical creatures and races! Shape your story through tons of meaningful choices, text characters and unlock wallpapers using an in-depth phone system, and learn about the world and its lore with an expansive glossary!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: This game features suggestive themes, mild language, and dirty jokes centered around (but are not limited to) certain bodily orifices, phallically shaped fruits and vegetables, and the word "cockapoo".
